remarks: Group multiple of a difference.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulgsubdi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgsubdi.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgsubdi.d $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
mulgsubdi $p |- ( ( G e. Abel /\ ( M e. ZZ /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( M .x. ( X .- Y ) ) = ( ( M .x. X ) .- ( M .x. Y ) ) ) $.
